    dockerlabs

    Trust - Dockerlabs

    June 22, 2024  

    This very easy machine required performing fuzzing to find hidden directories and obtain a user. Then, we used Hydra to brute force and get the SSH credentials. Finally, to escalate to root, we used the vim binary which had sudo permissions.

    linux bruteforce privileged vim
